cost.trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.
Effect: Connection - Shadow Force. The triggering effect does not affect the user, and the user gains @Affliction[transient]. The user may spend 2 PP as a Simple Action to gain or lose @Affliction[transient] as it wishes.

actions.name: Holographic Dominion
actions.description: Passive: While @Affliction[transient], the user deals 50% more damage with its Attacks, and only needs to spend 2 PP to remain @Affliction[transient] on each of its Activations.
